description: This responsibly sourced Merino wool men’s tee is designed with the mountain biker in mind. Its regular fit allows for unrestrained movement, it’s designed with reflective elements for when you’re riding in dim light, and it offers a longer back hem for extra coverage. Plus, it’s made with a blend of Merino wool and Tencel™ performance fabric, which helps with breathability, moisture management, and odor resistance, so you’ll still feel cool, even when your ride heats up. And with its understated yet classy block-stripe pattern, you’ll look good the whole time you shred your next trail.
name: Smartwool Ultralite Mountain Bike 3/4 Sleeve Tee - Mens

specs.value: 53% Merino Wool, 47% TENCEL™ Lyocell (exclusive of decoration)
